TopicTitle: Screen turns black except for the UI when launching vehicle.

Articles.Content:
I fixed the problem, it was Ven's Stock Revamp so if you have this problem and have that mod I suggest trying without Ven's.

First of all here is a screenshot, it is not mine but it looks exactly the same except for the mod ui's.

This happened when trying to launch a new plane, I tried loading a quicksave of a ship in space and the screen was still black, sometimes the game crashes right after.

Here is a screenshot of my GameData folder to see my mods:

I'm running KSP on this system:

Windows 7

8gb RAM

GTX 770

AMD FX 6300 6-Core Processor

Any help is appreciated and sorry for the horrible formatting I don't know how to do spoilers on this forum since

isn't working.

Edited February 27, 2015 by Arte
Mispelling

A small update: I made a new game thinking the save was corrupted but it happened again when trying to launch a plane, I still have the mods installed but I used only stock parts and the same thing happend.

there's a newer MM, 2.5.11, no idea if that helps.

If i had that problem i'd start to delete the mods 1 by 1 (starting with the latest installed) and see if it fixes the problem at some point and then either stop using the mod or trying to find a version of it that works (newer/older .. whatever works).
I've been researching and apparently this is a pretty common bug that happens in unmodded installs as well, but I will try to remove mods.
